creator: bruno@wolff.to
text:
In the mod_deflate documentation "dependant" is used instead of
"dependent". Unless this is a British spelling, this is a typo.
For context:
"If you use some special exclusions dependant on, for example, the
User-Agent header, you must manually configure an addition to the Vary
header to alert proxies of the additional restrictions. For example,"

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
that happens, when a German trys to type English documentation... ;-)

Thanks for using Apache!
